byline.original: By BRUCE C. VLADECK and STEPHEN I. VLADECK

abstract: Op-Ed article by former Medicare and Medicaid administrator Bruce C Vladeck and Prof Stephen I Vladeck contends that, even as it defends constitutionality of new health care law's individual mandate, Obama administration may be complicit in eviscerating Medicaid by its participation in California suit that seeks cuts in its program; warns of danger of setting back broader goal of ensuring that all Americans have access to quality health care.
snippet: If Medicaid’s equal access provision goes unenforced, providers will not participate.
lead_paragraph: If Medicaid’s equal access provision goes unenforced, providers will not participate.
